attributes.action: Remove Boris Johnson from office and proceed to a general election.
attributes.additional_details: The prime minister has completely disregarded the law, ministerial code and the conventions of our constitution. His cling to power is causing irreversible damage to our union of nations, the public cannot trust their own government. The government continues to express views that are not representative of their constituents. They spend more time defending themselves than they do the interests of this great nation. When confronted about their actions they reply with laughter. Unaccountability.
attributes.background: Remove Boris Johnson and his government from office, the people should have the right to express no confidence in their leader too.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign. 

You might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606033
